, (up to 1945 settlements Samarkand). The city located nearby to Quaraghandy, on coast Samarkand water basin in

. Railway station. 213,1 thousand inhabitants (1991). The Quaraghandy metallurgical combine (nowadays Mittal Steel Temirtau). Chemical manufacture "Carbide"; factories: synthetic rubber, steel-mechanical; the enterprises of the food-processing industry, building materials. Theatre.
In this city there began the career the president of Kazakhstan N.Nazarbaev, former vice-premier of Russia O.Soskovets, the former general public prosecutor of Russia A.Kazannik and many other politicians.
